subLine.text: (Whispering) It's like something is still missing.
subLine.speaker: M

subLine.text: It just need some more colors (giggling).
subLine.speaker: S

subLine.text: No no no, don't you, no! Come on!
subLine.speaker: M

subLine.text: Shit! Oh no no no, I'm so sorry (starts laughing).
subLine.speaker: S

subLine.text: You know what... It actually looks better now.
subLine.speaker: S
